mapper.select: SELECT t.`id`, t.`name`, count(a.`article_id`) AS `count` FROM tag AS t LEFT JOIN `article_tag` AS a ON t.`id` = a.`tag_id` LEFT JOIN `article` AS ac ON a.`article_id` = ac.`id` WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND ac.`status` = 1 AND ac.`is_public` = #{idx} GROUP BY t.`name` HAVING `count` > 0;
